accessibility.subtitle: User-Friendly Interface

accessibility.description: Our software is designed with accessibility in mind, ensuring that all users can navigate and use the system efficiently.

mobileApp.subtitle: On-the-Go Access

security.description: We prioritize the safety of your data with state-of-the-art security protocols and regular updates to protect against threats.

eBusiness.title: E-Business Solutions

network.subtitle: Connectivity
network.title: Network Infrastructure
network.description: Our robust network solutions ensure smooth communication and data flow across your entire organization.

emphasis.content: All modules and all elements are located in one program and are interconnected. Data entered in one module is immediately available in another module, so there is no double data entry.

erpSection.title: What is ISA-ERP?
erpSection.description: The ISA-ERP software package is a collection of interconnected program modules or subprograms that form a complete business information system.
